event.title: I Love Free Software Day online, Portugal

body.p: The Portuguese ANSOL will organise an "I Love Free Software Day" online meeting for all Portuguese Free Software enthusiasts. On ‚ÄòI Love Free Software Day‚Äô, we reach out to all those amazing people behind Free Software and recognize their work by saying ‚ÄòThank you ‚ô•‚Äô.
